As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or feelings, but I can provide an objective view on this topic.

Having a smart home can offer various conveniences and efficient services. However, relying entirely on a smart home may lead to laziness and dependency, as it reduces physical activities and decreases the need for manual tasks. It's essential to maintain a balance between smart technology and personal tasks to keep up with an active lifestyle. Additionally, using a fully integrated smart home requires technical skills and knowledge to program and maintain the home's infrastructure. Therefore, keeping an active role in the technicalities of your smart home can help avoid becoming too reliant on technological conveniences.
